'''Hydro Mimic Frogs''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble giant [[Frog]]s. They take more damage from {{Geo}}.

==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Mimic Frog

|name_1 = Torrential Waves
|desc_1 = Shoots a long-range wave straight at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} on hit.

|name_2 = High Leap
|desc_2 = Leaps upwards before slamming down, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Hydro DMG}} over the indicated area.

|name_3 = Water Bomb
|desc_3 = When defeated, transforms into a bomb that covers a wide area and deals '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Hydro DMG}} upon detonation.
|file_3 = Oceanid Water Bomb
}}
